q: State of the Union edition time pubdate datetime=`` 2011-01-27T17:14:24-05:00''> Mike Pence won't run for president, but will likely run for IN governor Indianapolis Star on the news that will disappoint some national conservatives: U.S. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. `` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.``
